title: PBE Error 500
body: Whenever I go to the PBE sign up page I get Error 500 with a picture of IBlitzcrank. I've had this problem for months now.

replies.body: This is something we're currently looking into, and have been requesting [support tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to help us investigate.  Most players should have that issue resolved now, and others might be able to workaround by using a VPN.  If that doesn't work with you, hit us up in a ticket so we can help individually.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

Hi! I've tried all the workarounds with vpns, different devices, browsers and links. Still haven't been able to get onto the PBE signup page! I keep getting the 500 error someway or the other. Can you help me out?? :)
Same i feel you man i tried cyber ghost and all that{{item:3070}}
